title: Slow Horses Interview Special With Jack Lowden
content: One of the very best things on Apple TV+ is Slow Horses, and one of the very best actors in Slow Horses is Jack Lowden - of Mary Queen Of Scots, Fighting With My Family and War And Peace fame - here playing alongside the legendary Gary Oldman in this thoroughly entertaining spy thriller series based on the books by Mick Herron. In this particular conversation, you'll hear Jack talking to Ali about meeting Sir Alex Ferguson, taking selfies with Mr. Oldman and what he's currently binging on TV. Pretty sure you're not going to guess what, to be honest...
